channel.title: CVE Feed for AVG/Avast -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AVG/Avast -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9481|2024-10-04T12:22:28.062Z -- avg%2Favast -- antivirus
item.description: An out-of-bounds write in the engine module in AVG/Avast Antivirus signature <24092400 released on 24/Sep/2024 on MacOS allows a malformed eml file to crash the application during file processing.

item.title: CVE-2024-9483|2024-10-04T12:29:16.430Z -- avg%2Favast -- antivirus
item.description: A null-pointer-dereference in the signature verification module in AVG/Avast Antivirus signature <24092400 released on 24/Sep/2024 on MacOS may allow a malformed xar file to crash the application during processing.

item.title: CVE-2024-9484|2024-10-04T12:44:25.057Z -- avg%2Favast -- antivirus
item.description: An null-pointer-derefrence in the engine module in AVG/Avast Antivirus signature <24092400 released on 24/Sep/2024 on MacOS allows a malformed xar file to crash the application during file processing.

item.title: CVE-2024-9482|2024-10-04T12:22:47.087Z -- avg%2Favast -- antivirus
item.description: An out-of-bounds write in the engine module in AVG/Avast Antivirus signature <24092400 released on 24/Sep/2024 on MacOS allows a malformed Mach-O file to crash the application during file processing.

item.title: CVE-2024-5803|2024-10-03T14:21:21.222Z -- avg%2Favast -- antivirus
item.description: The AVGUI.exe of AVG/Avast Antivirus before versions before 24.1 can allow a local attacker to escalate privileges via an COM hijack in a time-of-check to time-of-use (TOCTOU) when self protection is disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-5803|2024-10-03T15:38:40.784Z -- avg%2Favast -- antivirus
item.description: The AVGUI.exe of AVG/Avast Antivirus before versions before 24.1 can allow a local attacker to escalate privileges via an COM hijack in a time-of-check to time-of-use (TOCTOU) when self protection is disabled.
